mapper.delete: delete from t_blog where id = #{id}; delete from t_blog_tags where blog_id = #{id};
mapper.select: select b.id, b.first_picture, b.flag, b.title, b.content, b.views,b.update_time,b.commentabled, u.nickname, u.avatar, tag.id tagid, tag.name tagname from t_blog b, t_user u, t_tag tag, t_blog_tags tb where b.user_id = u.id and tb.blog_id = b.id and tb.tag_id = tag.id and b.id = #{id}
select b.id, b.title, b.update_time, b.recommend, b.type_id, b.published, t.id typeid, t.name typename from t_blog b, t_type t where b.type_id = t.id /*博客类型id=类型id*/

select b.id, b.title, b.first_picture, b.views, b.update_time, b.description, t.name typename, t.id typeid, u.nickname, u.avatar from t_blog b, t_type t, t_user u where b.type_id = t.id and u.id = b.user_id and b.type_id = #{typeId} order by b.update_time desc

select b.id, b.title, b.first_picture, b.views, b.update_time, b.description, t.name, u.nickname,u.avatar from t_blog b, t_tag t, t_user u, t_blog_tags tb where u.id = b.user_id and tb.blog_id = b.id and tb.tag_id = t.id and t.id = #{tagId} order by b.update_time desc

select b.id, b.title, b.first_picture, b.views, b.update_time, b.description, t.name typename, t.id typeid, u.nickname, u.avatar from t_blog b, t_type t, t_user u where b.type_id = t.id and u.id = b.user_id and t.name = #{typeName} order by b.update_time desc

select b.id, b.title, b.first_picture, b.views, b.update_time, b.description, t.name typename, t.id typeid, u.nickname, u.avatar from t_blog b, t_tag t, t_user u, t_blog_tags tb where tb.blog_id = b.id and t.id = tb.tag_id and t.name = #{typeName} and u.id = b.user_id order by b.update_time desc

select b.id, b.title, b.first_picture, b.views, b.update_time, b.description, t.name typename, t.id typeid, u.nickname, u.avatar from t_blog b, t_type t, t_user u where b.type_id = t.id and u.id = b.user_id order by b.update_time desc

select b.id, b.title, b.first_picture, b.views, b.update_time, b.description, t.name typename, u.nickname, u.avatar from t_blog b, t_type t, t_user u where b.type_id = t.id and u.id = b.user_id and (b.title like #{pattern} or b.content like #{pattern}) order by b.update_time desc

/*模糊查询*/ select b.id, b.title, b.update_time, b.recommend, b.published, b.type_id, t.id typeid, t.name typename from t_blog b ,t_type t
b.type_id = t.id /*博客类型id=类型id*/
and b.type_id = #{typeId} /*根据博客类型查询*/
and b.recommend = #{recommend} /*根据博客推荐查询*/
and b.title like #{pattern} /*根据博客title模糊查询*/
select DATE_FORMAT(b.update_time, '%Y') from t_blog b order by b.update_time desc
mapper.update: update t_blog set published = #{published},flag = #{flag} , title = #{title}, content = #{content}, type_id = #{typeId}, tag_ids = #{tagIds}, first_picture = #{firstPicture} , description = #{description} , recommend = #{recommend} , update_time = #{updateTime}, commentabled = #{commentabled} where id = #{id};
mapper.insert: insert into t_blog (title, content, first_picture, flag, views,published,recommend, create_time, update_time, type_id, tag_ids, user_id, description,commentabled) values (#{title}, #{content}, #{firstPicture}, #{flag}, #{views}, #{published}, #{recommend}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{typeId}, #{tagIds}, #{userId}, #{description},#{commentabled});
mapper.delete: delete from t_blog_tags where tag_id = #{arg0} and blog_id = #{arg1}
